title: Schola cordis, or, The heart of it selfe, gone away from God brought back againe to him & instructed by him in 47 emblems.
author: Harvey, Christopher, 1597-1663.
notes: Adapted by Christopher Harvey from Bendictus van Haeften's "Schola cordis."  Sometimes wrongly ascribed to Francis Quarles.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
